name: QuoteHeroTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
No matter if you're young or old, we all need a little advice and good counsel in making our life better, and the QuoteHero Life Tip of the Day gives you a daily dose of experience aimed at helping you get the most out of your life. From household tips to security secrets to saving money, every episode of the QuoteHero Life Tip of the Day will help you live a better, smarter and more informed life.

Hosted by Steve Weber, this lively daily show is produced by QuoteHero, an innovative new technology provider that offers a one-stop solution for many of life's vital protection needs, including insurance, warranty, and personal/family protection products.

Since 2017, QuoteHero has helped thousands of people save money, stay safe and navigate their lives more effectively.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
